title: Strictly's tearful Katya admits she wants to kiss Mike
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Click to play Tap to play

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Tearful Strictly pro Katya Jones admitted that she wanted to kiss Mike Bushell - almost a year after kissgate.

Katya was left incredibly emotional tonight after she and BBC presenter Mike wowed the judges with their performance tonight.

After receiving a nine from judge Motsi Mabuse, Katya couldn't contain the tears as they hugged tightly.

Mike asked in shock: "Is this a dream?"

Meanwhile an inconsolable Katya was asked by Claudia Winkleman if she was alright, prompting Mike to kiss her on the cheek.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Grabbing him around the neck, she squealed: "I want to kiss him so much! He worked so hard!""

And fans couldn't believe what she had just said.

One tweeted: "Did Katya just say she wanted to kiss him?!! #notAgain!!! #Strictly."

While another commented: "That was all a bit awks with Katya. “I want to kiss him” and all those tears. Was that about the dancing ? #Strictly."

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

A third remarked: "Katya saying ‘ I just want to kiss you’ errr awkward #strictly."

"Katya ‘I could kiss him’ yeah...maybe not the best comment #Strictly," another quipped.

One remarked: "Better not kiss him Katya... Just to be safe #Strictly."

*Strictly Come Dancing returns tomorrow on BBC One
description: Professional dancer Katya Jones was incredibly emotional after her routine this evening
